original_text: For the Lord of hosts hath purposed, and who shall disannul it? and his hand is stretched out, and who shall turn it back?
korean_text: 만군의 여호와께서 경영하셨은즉 누가 능히 그것을 폐하며 그의 손을 펴셨은즉 누가 능히 그것을 돌이키랴

sentences.original_text: For the Lord of hosts hath purposed
and his hand is stretched out
and who shall turn it back?
